Your Rage can keep you fighting despite grievous wounds. If you drop to [1] hit points while your Rage is active and don't die outright, you can make a DC [2] Constitution Saving Throw. If you succeed, your hit points instead change to a number equal to twice your Barbarian level.

Each time you use this feature after the first, the DC increases by [3]. When you finish a Short Rest or Long Rest, the DC resets to [2].
The number of turns remaining for this status is equal to the number of times that <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CL_Passive_OneDnD_RelentlessRage">Relentless Rage</LSTag> has succeeded.
